entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 6:49 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

Temperature: -2.2°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 46 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
